title: Article to the Discord issues with League?
body: Is there an article explaining the current overlay issues with Discord in relation to League of Legends?

replies.body: My poro-bro [**Porocles made an article**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/vMeIcUF7-i-cant-interact-with-the-game) talking a little about this, but essentially the overlay just doesn't work correctly with League. Since it's not our program, there's not anything we can really do to fix it, other than let you know to disable it if you're wanting to play League.
